data.text: The Israeli people say, “Come, let’s return to Yahweh!
After a very short time he will revive us;
We must try to know Yahweh;
But Yahweh knows they are insincere;
I warned [HYP] you by the messages that I gave to the prophets,
I want my people to faithfully love me
But they have refused to obey my agreement, just like Adam did;
Gilead is a city full of people who do wicked things;
The priests are like [SIM] bandits who wait ◄in ambushes/along the road► to attack people;
I have seen horrible things being done in Israel [MTY].
